# p-flex



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                                                                                                                                                               | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | Default        |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| `alignContent`   | `align-content`   | This aligns a flex container's individual lines when there is extra space in the cross-axis, similar to how "justifyContent" aligns individual items along the main axis. | `string \| { base?: "center" \| "flex-start" \| "flex-end" \| "space-between" \| "space-around" \| "space-evenly" \| "stretch"; xs?: "center" \| "flex-start" \| "flex-end" \| "space-between" \| "space-around" \| "space-evenly" \| "stretch"; s?: "center" \| "flex-start" \| "flex-end" \| "space-between" \| "space-around" \| "space-evenly" \| "stretch"; m?: "center" \| "flex-start" \| "flex-end" \| "space-between" \| "space-around" \| "space-evenly" \| "stretch"; l?: "center" \| "flex-start" \| "flex-end" \| "space-between" \| "space-around" \| "space-evenly" \| "stretch"; xl?: "center" \| "flex-start" \| "flex-end" \| "space-between" \| "space-around" \| "space-evenly" \| "stretch"; } & { base: "center" \| "flex-start" \| "flex-end" \| "space-between" \| "space-around" \| "space-evenly" \| "stretch"; }` | `'stretch'`    |
| `alignItems`     | `align-items`     | Defines how the flex items are aligned along the cross axis.                                                                                                              | `string \| { base?: "center" \| "flex-start" \| "flex-end" \| "stretch" \| "baseline"; xs?: "center" \| "flex-start" \| "flex-end" \| "stretch" \| "baseline"; s?: "center" \| "flex-start" \| "flex-end" \| "stretch" \| "baseline"; m?: "center" \| "flex-start" \| "flex-end" \| "stretch" \| "baseline"; l?: "center" \| "flex-start" \| "flex-end" \| "stretch" \| "baseline"; xl?: "center" \| "flex-start" \| "flex-end" \| "stretch" \| "baseline"; } & { base: "center" \| "flex-start" \| "flex-end" \| "stretch" \| "baseline"; }`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | `'stretch'`    |
| `direction`      | `direction`       | Defines the direction of the main and cross axis. The default "row" defines the main axis as horizontal left to right.                                                    | `string \| { base?: "row" \| "row-reverse" \| "column" \| "column-reverse"; xs?: "row" \| "row-reverse" \| "column" \| "column-reverse"; s?: "row" \| "row-reverse" \| "column" \| "column-reverse"; m?: "row" \| "row-reverse" \| "column" \| "column-reverse"; l?: "row" \| "row-reverse" \| "column" \| "column-reverse"; xl?: "row" \| "row-reverse" \| "column" \| "column-reverse"; } & { base: "row" \| "row-reverse" \| "column" \| "column-reverse"; }`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `'row'`        |
| `inline`         | `inline`          | Defines the flex containers content flow if 2 or more containers are siblings of each other.                                                                              | `boolean \| string \| { base?: boolean; xs?: boolean; s?: boolean; m?: boolean; l?: boolean; xl?: boolean; } & { base: boolean; }`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | `false`        |
| `justifyContent` | `justify-content` | Defines how the flex items are aligned along the main axis.                                                                                                               | `string \| { base?: "center" \| "flex-start" \| "flex-end" \| "space-between" \| "space-around" \| "space-evenly"; xs?: "center" \| "flex-start" \| "flex-end" \| "space-between" \| "space-around" \| "space-evenly"; s?: "center" \| "flex-start" \| "flex-end" \| "space-between" \| "space-around" \| "space-evenly"; m?: "center" \| "flex-start" \| "flex-end" \| "space-between" \| "space-around" \| "space-evenly"; l?: "center" \| "flex-start" \| "flex-end" \| "space-between" \| "space-around" \| "space-evenly"; xl?: "center" \| "flex-start" \| "flex-end" \| "space-between" \| "space-around" \| "space-evenly"; } & { base: "center" \| "flex-start" \| "flex-end" \| "space-between" \| "space-around" \| "space-evenly"; }`                                                                                            | `'flex-start'` |
| `wrap`           | `wrap`            | If set, overflowing elements will wrap to a new line.                                                                                                                     | `string \| { base?: "nowrap" \| "wrap" \| "wrap-reverse"; xs?: "nowrap" \| "wrap" \| "wrap-reverse"; s?: "nowrap" \| "wrap" \| "wrap-reverse"; m?: "nowrap" \| "wrap" \| "wrap-reverse"; l?: "nowrap" \| "wrap" \| "wrap-reverse"; xl?: "nowrap" \| "wrap" \| "wrap-reverse"; } & { base: "nowrap" \| "wrap" \| "wrap-reverse"; }`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | `'nowrap'`     |
